name: Test yourself! Take this The Parking Garage Quiz | 'Seinfeld' - Episodes

questions.text: What does Elaine buy at the mall?
questions.explanation:
Fish.

	During the episode, Elaine is worried about the life span of her fish inside the little plastic bag because they might not get home on time.

questions.text: Whose parents are having their anniversary?
questions.explanation:
George's parents.

	George told his parents to meet him outside his apartment building at 6:15 for dinner and a movie, but he never gets home on time.

questions.text: Where does Kramer keep the air conditioner?
questions.explanation:
Purple 23.

	Kramer leaves the air conditioner behind to go look for the car, and he plans on getting it back once it's found.  Michael Richards (Kramer) asked to carry a real air conditioner in the box to make the struggle more realistic.

questions.text: Who persuades Jerry to urinate in the parking garage?
questions.explanation:
Kramer.

	Kramer tells him to go behind a car, so Jerry does, and he ends up getting caught doing it by a mall security guard.

New Jersey.

	Elaine leaves Kramer and George to go look for Jerry, and she says that she'll only take five minutes.  George and Kramer soon walk off.

questions.text: What anniversary are George's parents having?
questions.explanation:
Forty-seventh.

	Both George and Jerry use the same excuse after both of them are caught urinating in the parking garage because of Kramer's advice.

questions.text: Does George spit on a Mercedes?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Just as George is about to spit on the car, the owner comes along, so George tries to cover it up that he was going to spit on the car which took up two parking spaces.

questions.text: What is the name of the woman who offers to drive the group around the garage?
questions.explanation:
Michelle.

	Michelle said she'd be happy to do it, but George says something bad to her that gets them kicked out of her car.  Luckily, she drops them off right beside the car they were looking for.

questions.text: What colour is the car that the group is looking for?
questions.explanation:
Brown.

	The group finds the car, but they still have to wait for Kramer who couldn't find where he left the air conditioner.

questions.text: Does the group leave the garage during the episode?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Kramer finally makes it back to the car with the air conditioner.  Elaine's fish die, George is late to meet his parents, and the car doesn't start.
